description: This Kotlin source file defines an in-memory dummy repository for TV channels, programs, VOD items, and favorites data. It provides functions to retrieve sample data and perform simple search operations, primarily used for testing or prototyping in development.

classes.name: SearchResults
classes.description: Data class aggregating search results across programs, VOD items, and favorites.

methods.name: getChannels
methods.description: Returns a list of dummy TV channel data.

methods.name: getProgramsForToday
methods.description: Returns a list of today's dummy program items for different channels.

methods.name: getVodCatalog
methods.description: Returns a list of dummy Video on Demand items.

methods.name: getFavorites
methods.description: Returns the current list of favorite items.

methods.name: isFavorite
methods.description: Checks if an item with a given ID is marked as favorite.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Adds or removes an item from the favorites list.

methods.name: searchAll
methods.description: Performs a search across programs, VOD, and favorites based on the query string.
